scripts.prebuild:
node -p "'/**
 * Library version
 * @public
 */
export const VERSION = ' + JSON.stringify(require('./package.json').version) + ';'" > src/version.ts
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config=webpack.config.js --progress && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config=webpack.config.js --progress --env minify
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:legacy-js && npm run build:types
scripts.build:js: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BROWSERSLIST_ENV=modern webpack --config=webpack.config.js --progress && cross-env NODE_ENV=production BROWSERSLIST_ENV=modern webpack --config=webpack.config.js --progress --env minify
scripts.build:legacy-js: cross-env NODE_ENV=production.old BROWSERSLIST_ENV=legacy webpack --config=webpack.config.js --progress && cross-env NODE_ENV=production.old BROWSERSLIST_ENV=legacy webpack --config=webpack.config.js --progress --env minify
